trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around May 11th 2010
Summary: Black orb hovering in sky stationary at times moving from east to west!
divs: sighting detailsbeen interested in ufo's for a while now! and have been watching the sky recently with binoculars. so at about 1:55pm on may 11, 2010 i went out on my back patio and begain scanning the sky, i was looking for about 1 min. when i noticed just about straight above my head about 1,000 to 2,000 feet above(not sure how high it was cause i had nothing to compare it to!) was a black sphere maybe 3 feet across and seem to be a perfect sphere, best way i can describe it was as a black pearl just sitting still in the sky. i watched it sit there not moving for about 5 min. and then it began making little movements to the west stoping at times perfectly still. it didn't seem to get any higher, stayed at same alt. i watched it for about 5 more min. and then it just seemed to vanish, after which i looked for the object for about 15 min. and could never find it again! i would also like to note that since i had binoculars i got a really good look at it and was not a bird, plane or a balloon! so to recap(black sphere,no lights, moved and stopped, lasted for 10min, about 3 feet wide, 1,000 to 2,000 feet high, moving east to west, vanished!!) would have taken a photo but i don't own a camara that is worth a damn!! and to make sure i answer all your questions posted on the left side of your web page! 1. in lutz fl. at my apartment looking for objects with my binoculars! 2. i first noticed a black haze and then focused in on it and noticed it was a perfect black sphere sitting still in the sky! 3. i thought it was a bird until i focused and seen it had no wings and wasn't moving at first( didn't move at all the first 5 min. i watched it!) 4. black sphere about 3 feet wide, not real sure about size, stationary at first then began making little almost unoticable movements to the west, moving and stoping for 30 to 40 sec. at a time! 5. i first felt interested in the objected thinking i was gonna be able to debunk what i was seeing and after a few moments i began to feel a very erie vibe cause i felt like i was seeing something i wasn't suppose to be seeing, it was like it was trying to hide in plain site! after it was over i was shaking and excited and can not stop thinking about what i seen! 6. after about 10 mins. it just vanished and i could not find it again(looked for about 15 to 20 mins everywhere and could not find it again!) thank you for your time and please let me know if anyone else seen this in my area or anywhere for that matter!! you or anyone that has seen one of these can email me at [cms\tg\pid]
